# ocp_tier

Looks up a storage tier by name.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "ocp_tier" "example" {
  name = "Bronze"
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the object.

### Optional

- `solution_type` (String) Solution type.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the object.
